scripts.my-treat: cd js && type my-treat.txt | node my-treat.js > out.txt
scripts.ascii-dancer: cd js && type ascii-dancer.txt | node ascii-dancer.js > out.txt
scripts.andman: cd js && type andman.txt | node andman.js > out.txt
scripts.pizza-cutter: cd py && type pizza-cutter.txt | py pizza-cutter.py > out.txt
scripts.pipeline: cd py && type pipeline.txt | py pipeline.py > out.txt
scripts.gauis: cd py && type gauis.txt | py gauis.py > out.txt
